maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: We should not leave through the entrance. Strange things could happen.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: Il ne faut pas que l'on sorte par l'entrée. Il pourrait se passer des choses étranges, sinon.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: Lea, not the door please. The exit sign.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: Lea, pas par la porte, s'il te plaît. Prends le point de sortie.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: Oh! Well... we should take care of those first.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: Oh ! Bon... il faut qu'on s'occupe d'eux avant.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: This time we'll exit through the wall to the east!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: Cette fois on va devoir s'enfuir par le mur à l'est !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: Sorry, I forgot to fix the routine for sideway jumps...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: Désolé, j'ai oublié de corriger la routine pour les sauts latéraux...

maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.orig: A-Anyway, it should work now. Promise.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-06.json/entitie.text: O-Oui, bon. En tout cas, ça devrait marcher maintenant. Promis.
Essaye encore une fois s'il te plaît.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Alright! That worked.
Okay... where next again?
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: OK... il faut aller où maintenant déjà ?

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Help me....
Please...
Help me...
H-Hi?!
Wha...\. What the heck is this?!
There you are!
This was certainly not meant to be seen by the likes of you.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Cela ne devait certainement pas être vu par des gens comme toi.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: In this tower you shall abide to the constraints laid in front of you.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Dans cette tour, tu dois obéir aux restrictions qui sont placées devant toi.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Not break through the walls as you please.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Et non pas traverser les murs comme bon te semble.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: We won't tolerate behavior like this!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: De tels méfaits auront des conséquences !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Your little journey will end now!
Shoot...
He found out sooner than I had hoped.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Il s'en est rendu compte plus tôt que ce que j'espérais.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Lea, you must not be caught up in one of his battles, we have to escape!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Lea, il ne faut en aucun cas rester empêtré dans un de ses combats, il faut qu'on s'échappe d'ici !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Run to the next symbol as fast as possible!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Cours vers le prochain symbole aussi vite que possible !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: Take off.
Preposterous!\. Is there any end to your damage?!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: C'est grotesque !\. N'y a-t-il aucune limite à tes dégâts ?!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.orig: We have plenty more of those to spare!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-07.json/entitie.text: Nous en avons plein d'autres en stock !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-08.json/entitie.orig: You need to reach to the \c[3]other side\c[0] of this room. To the \c[3]east\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-08.json/entitie.text: Il faut que tu atteignes l'\c[3]autre côté\c[0] de cette salle. Vers l'\c[3]est\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-09.json/entitie.orig: Further to the \c[3]east\c[0]! You need to reach the \c[3]wall\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-09.json/entitie.text: Encore vers l'\c[3]est\c[0] ! Il faut que tu ailles vers le \c[3]mur\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Almost there! To the \c[3]east\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: On y est presque ! Encore à l'\c[3]est\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Take off.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Décoller.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Break through!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Passer à travers !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: What...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Quoi...

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Time to demonstrate \c[3]exponential growth\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Il est temps de faire une démonstration de la \c[3]puissance d'attaque exponentielle\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Now that was quite predictable!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: C'était assez prévisible !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: We have a good idea of where you are heading.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Nous avons une bonne petite idée de là où vous allez.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Damn it!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Bon sang !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Lukas...\. he is in the room to the east.\. We have to reach that wall.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Lukas...\. il est dans la salle juste à l'est.\. Il faut qu'on atteigne le mur !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Now, we can't have you meet up with your friend!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Nous ne pouvons pas vous laisser rejoindre votre ami !
Après tout, cet endroit n'est prévu que pour un seul individu à la fois.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: This place is designed for one individual at a time, after all.
If your hopes are to escape this place, your journey is destined to fail!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Si tu espères pouvoir t'échapper d'ici, alors ton échec est inévitable !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: An exit does not exist.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Il n'existe pas de sortie.
C'est ce qu'il croit, en tout cas.\. Je vais vous sortir de là, fais-moi confiance.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: That is what he thinks, anyway.\. I will get you out of here, trust me.
Alas, watching you twirling through this complex...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Et pourtant, te voir virevolter à travers ce complexe...

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: It is quite entertaining to say the least!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: C'est, pour le dire franchement, assez divertissant !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: This resourcefulness... It is unlike anything we have witnessed so far.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Ce talent... Il n'est comme aucun autre vu jusqu'à présent.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Hence, we shall honor it with an appropriate climax!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Nous nous devons donc l'honorer d'un climax à la hauteur !!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: It shall be your final challenge!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Ce sera ton challenge final !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Let us see if you can overcome the nigh impossible!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Montre-nous si tu es capable de surmonter l'impossible !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Lea...\. whatever happens, do not give up!\. We have to get through this!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Lea...\. Peu importe ce qui arrive, n'abandonne pas !\. Il faut tenir bon !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Lea...\. this enemy...\. its maximum HP is ridiculously high.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Lea...\. Cet ennemi...\. Son HP maximum est ridiculement élevé.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Trillion... Quadrillion...?
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Des billions... billiards... ?

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: I'm not even sure how to say this number...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Je ne suis même pas sûr de comment il faut dire ce nombre.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.note: well just look it up on wikipedia

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: However...\. it is \c[3]not infinite\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Mais...\. il n'est \c[3]pas infini\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: That means it is possible to defeat it!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Ça veut dire qu'il est possible de le vaincre !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: There is just one thing we have to do.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Il y a juste une chose que nous devons faire.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: \c[3]Adjust your attack\c[0] appropriately.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: \c[3]Ajuster ton attaque\c[0] en conséquence.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Yes, you heard that right. We have to make your \c[1]ridiculous attack damage\c[0] even higher.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Oui, tu as bien entendu. Il faut rendre tes \c[1]dégâts ridiculement élevés\c[0] encore plus ridiculement élevés.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: I just figured out a way to do that within security constraints.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Je viens juste de trouver un moyen de faire ça en respectant les contraintes de sécurité.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Focus on \c[3]defeating the burning slug enemies\c[0] before they explode!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Concentre-toi sur les \c[3]limaces brulantes\c[0] avant qu'elles n'explosent !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: As many as possible!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Abats en le plus possible !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Once again, you have a little trick up your sleeves.
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Encore une fois, tu as un autre petit tour dans ton sac.

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Alas, it is but a drop in the ocean!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Hélas, ce n'est rien d'autre qu'une goutte d'eau dans l'océan !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Lea, just keep going...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Lea, continue comme ça...

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Intriguing...
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Curieux...

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: N-No way!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: I-Impossible !!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: The nigh impossible...\. about to be overcome!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: L'impossible...\. bientôt réalisé !!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: We see where this is going... but we won't let you have your way that easily!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Nous savons déjà où cela mène... mais nous allons pas te laisser faire librement !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Now... How long can you keep up with this?!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Maintenant... Combien de temps tiendras-tu contre ça ?!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Lea, keep dodging! I got this!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Lea, continue d'esquiver ! Je m'en occupe !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: I'm almost there! Just a bit longer!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: J'y suis presque ! Encore un petit moment !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: And... GO!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Et... MAINTENANT !!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Quick, to the marker!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Vite, le marqueur !!

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Noooo!\. This was \c[1]too quick\c[0]!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Noooon !\. C'était \c[1]trop rapide\c[0] !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: This is too rich!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: C'est trop bon !

maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.orig: Now Lea, quickly!!
maps/arid-dng/first/room-10.json/entitie.text: Maintenant, Lea, vite !!
